case_title: Mrs. ANIS HAIDER and others vs S. AMIR HAIDER and others

key_events.event: Suit for administration of property filed by daughters
Application under section 12(2), C.P.C. filed by daughters alleging fraud
Trial Court's order restored by Lahore High Court
Supreme Court remanded case to trial court

court_directions: Decide application under section 12(2), C.P.C. within six months

summary: The Supreme Court remanded the case to the trial court for recording evidence and deciding the application under section 12(2), C.P.C. within six months, emphasizing that serious allegations of fraud and forgery require proper evidence and cannot be dismissed solely based on written statements.
